1.0.0.name: wordpress/sharebuttons
1.0.0.description:
The easiest way to add sharing buttons to your blog posts for: Facebook, Digg, Twitter, Email, Reddit, StumbleUpon, etc.

The buttons appear only AFTER you have published your blog post.

You can always change what buttons you want to appear.

What makes it different from other sharing plugins?

Having large buttons for only the most popular sharing sites is far more effective than a single sharing link that overwhelms users with tons of sharing options.

Benefits

  1. Maximize your traffic (more than any other sharing plugin)
  2. Increase SEO (via social media backlinks)

Want to add photo galleries to your blog posts?

  1. Try our Gallery plugin: http://development.picturesurf.org/fotoglif-gallery
